inclusion.criterion: Bilateral salpingo-oophorectomy and hysterectomy at least 6 months before study entry
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Serum total testosterone concentrations less than 31 ng/dL or free testosterone less than 3.5 pg/ml
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Able to understand and give informed consent
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: On a stable regimen of transdermal estrogen replacement for at least three months
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Normal PAP smear (if subject has a cervix) and mammogram in the preceding 12 months
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Significant depression, as assessed by Beck's Depression Scale
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Any acute or chronic illness, malignant disease or fever of known or unknown origin
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Poorly controlled diabetes mellitus (hemoglobin A1c greater than 8.5%)
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Uncontrolled hypertension defined as blood pressure of greater than 160/100
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Severe obesity defined as body mass index of greater than 40 kg/m2
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Current or recent (last 6 months) users of illicit drugs
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: History of breast, ovarian, endometrial or cervical cancer
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has history of acne and mild hirsutism, elevated testosterone levels, and a macroadenoma with no invasion. She is on stable doses of octreotide LAR.
